org.jcvlib.imageproc

Class Hist

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jcvlib.imageproc.Hist

  • public class Hist
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains methods for manipulate image histograms.
    Version:
    1.022
    Author:
    Dmitriy Zavodnikov (d.zavodnikov@gmail.com)

    • Field Detail

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CORREL

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CORREL
        Correlation comparison.

        Return values in interval [-1.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 1.0
        • Half match -- 0.0
        • Total mismatch -- -1.0

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CHISQR

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_CHISQR
        Chi-Square comparison.

        Return values in interval [0.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 0.0
        • Half match -- 0.25
        • Total mismatch -- 1.0

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_INTERSECT

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_INTERSECT
        Intersection comparison.

        Return values in interval [0.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 1.0
        • Half match -- 0.5
        • Total mismatch -- 0.0

         d(H1, H2) = Sumi( Min(H1(i), H2(i)) )

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_BHATTACHARYYA

        public static final int HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_BHATTACHARYYA
        Bhattacharyya comparison.

        Return values in interval [0.0, 1.0]

        Examples:

        • Exact match -- 0.0
        • Half match -- 0.55
        • Total mismatch -- 1.0

        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • calculateHistogram

        public static double[] calculateHistogram(Image image,
                          int size)
        Create image histogram. Return array with size size * numOfChannels!
        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        size - Size of histogram that will be created.
        Returns:
        Array of double with value from interval Color.COLOR_MIN_VALUE and Color.COLOR_MAX_VALUE and with size size * numOfChannels. Sum of all values gives Color.COLOR_MAX_VALUE.

      • calculateHistogram

        public static double[] calculateHistogram(Image image)
        Create image histogram.

        Return array with size size * numOfChannels! Use 256 elements by default.

        Parameters:
        image - Source image.
        Returns:
        Array of double with value from interval [0.0, 1.0] and with size size * numOfChannels. Sum of all values gives 1.0.

      • compareHist

        public static double compareHist(double[] hist1,
                 double[] hist2,
                 int compareType)
        Compare 2 histograms.

        Histograms must have the same size!

        Parameters:
        hist1 - First histogram.
        hist2 - Second histogram.
        compareType - Type of compare histograms. Use Hist.HISTOGRAM_COMPARE_*.
